column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////My pizza was OK
column2: but I have had MUCH better deep dish and was expecting it to be more than just OK.  I order the special crust
column3: but it was a little hard
column4: instead of crisp and lacked the flavor of a well-developed dough.  The toppings were OK
column5: but could have used a bit more seasoning.  The sausage was bland.
